channel.title: My "I need ideas" thread
channel.description: I need some ideas for my server, something custom with the skills, mini-games, quests, whatever idea's you have and would like to share, I would love to hear them.

item.title: My "I need ideas" thread
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:455460”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=558364.msg4087219#msg4087219 date=1345986018]

I posted an idea thread scroll down on this board.

As for more minigames…

I would love to see a “pet wars” Similar to God Wars except your pets are the fighters.

I saw this on a server the other day so I can’t take credits for it but being able to “capture” a npc like a hill giant and making it a trained fighter for you would be awesome as well

It shouldn’t be that hard to make, why don’t you try it?
[/quote]I never said it would be lol, I don’t program anymore myself. I was just throwing out ideas[/quote]
I’ve removed the summoning base from my source. So this wouldn’t be possible, nor do I know how to go about adding pets.

Read full topic

item.title: My "I need ideas" thread
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:455460”]I posted an idea thread scroll down on this board.

As for more minigames…

I would love to see a “pet wars” Similar to God Wars except your pets are the fighters.

I saw this on a server the other day so I can’t take credits for it but being able to “capture” a npc like a hill giant and making it a trained fighter for you would be awesome as well[/quote]

It shouldn’t be that hard to make, why don’t you try it?

Read full topic

item.title: My "I need ideas" thread
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It would help to get input from an audience that is aware of what they’re giving input on. Atm, no one here is aware of the status of your server presently. And I’m sure there will be a few replies giving suggestions-- however I would hope that in progressing with your server source you realize that it’s your modifications you’re making and your source. Ideas should be derived from the publisher, not the audience.

And as I said before, if you are to get suggestions, input, etc., it’s probably best to keep it open to members of your server. Otherwise I don’t see how you take any value in anyone’s replies. It’s not as if you have any chance that these posts are going to be from members that are willing to play your server. Members here at moparscape are busy developing, not playing.

Read full topic

item.title: My "I need ideas" thread
item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:455460”]I posted an idea thread scroll down on this board.

As for more minigames…

I would love to see a “pet wars” Similar to God Wars except your pets are the fighters.

I saw this on a server the other day so I can’t take credits for it but being able to “capture” a npc like a hill giant and making it a trained fighter for you would be awesome as well[/quote]

That reminds me of that old show where the hooked up robots and made them fight, in a somewhat non-related way.

For quest’s you could always look to books and there story lines, many books can give you ideas to build upon, and for a minigame perhaps something of “Shifting” into different monsters/objects in a arena with however many players. Luck based and skill based the longer you play perhaps.

Read full topic
